item.title: Best linux OS for hosting a minecraft server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ajdakiwii:

I have 4.47GB Download left for the month, would downloaded the 10.04 use up alot of it?

You could check yourself, but it is less than 700mb.

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:11, topic:395076”]Download Arch Linux
Install minimal packages
sudo pacman -S jre
download server using wget or some other cli program
???
profit[/quote]
I don’t know anyone who would recommend Arch for a server you wish to remain stable. The rolling releases inevitably cause things to break every now and then, which is fine for your personal computer, but not so for a server.
